name: Holiday Inn Valencia

reviews.text: We had 2 rooms for our stay- room 719- no view, a little bit small for a couple with 2 young children, TV - poor quality . Than we had room 809- super!!! big room, nice view, they left a lot of towels for all of us, Breakfast was incredible good- Fresh Orange Juice, cheese ( a lot of), ham, everything- and the staff at the entrance of the restaurant - very nice. Internet is expensive. But we were in holiday so it was perfect- bus nr 19 is in front of the hotel- you can go to city center and to the Railway Station (Nord Renfe) , nr 20 -to the beach. Museum of Arts & Science- 15 min walking - Comercial Center &Carrefour- 15 min walking. And a very good restaurant in front of the hotel- closed on monday - they cook good" calamares en la plancha"
reviews.title: Very nice location, perfect breakfast

reviews.text: Stayed at the Holiday Inn Valencia for 3 nights in the middle of july, and was overall very pleased with my stay.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: First of all, the front desk staff were very helpful, and helped us out with everything from dining tips to city maps to extra towels in our room. The restaurant staff, on the other hand, not so helpful. Service was slow, and one time we didn't even get to order food. Even though it was just five minutes until the kitchen opened. The waiter could at least have taken our order and told us that the kitchen would open in five minutes.
reviews.title: fab for a girls weekend!

reviews.text: Our room was spacious and clean, with everything we needed. Our bathroom was huge!But as other travellers have mentioned, the hallway outside the room was quite smelly...
reviews.title: It's OK

reviews.text: The rooftop pool is really small, even smaller than it looks on the hotel webpage.
reviews.title: Few problems but ok.

reviews.text: This is a nice modern hotel in a great location for the science park and Park del Turia. Not so good for the beach or town but you can use a bus or a taxi. Nice rooms well finished but wooden floors in a hotel, who thought of that. With noisey neighbours you can hear everything!
reviews.title: Nice hotel great staff

reviews.text: Very good polite staff and the breakfast is a bargain at the current exchange rate.
reviews.title: Ticked all the boxes!

likes.disliked: — Nothing this time around, well done Holiday Inn!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool area is tiny, very tiny on top of the hotel. The views are of neighbouring appartments.
reviews.title: bath tub sized pool, poor reception staff

likes.disliked: — service, ridculous sized pool, small restaurant (breakfast in shifts!)

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.text: All in all we had a very good 12 night stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a VERY good hotel. The name Holiday Inn does not always set the imagination ablaze, but this is one of the best hotels I have stayed at for a long while. Good room, Good breakfast and Good staff. The location is good , very close to the science park and Aqua shopping mall. It seems to be located in the middle of the run from the beach to the old town. There are a handful of restaurants nearby, but you should head to either 'placa de la reina' or ' las arenas' areas for the best nightlife.
reviews.title: Hotel close to Arts and Sciences

likes.liked: — location to Arts & Sciences and overall amenities and comfort
likes.disliked: — Not being able to control room temperature, too warm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was clean and nice. The staff was helpful. The location was out of the way. They arranged a taxi to the train station when we were leaving which was good. The room and bathroom was large. There was a pool we were unable to access. Quiet hotel on a busy street. Nothing special, but still nice.
reviews.title: Average Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very simply the hotel was in the right place for our brief visit to valencia as we were touring Spain by car.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not expect much more than normal in these kind of hotels but one thing here was different. Sure it was clean, convenient, and efficient, but the one thing that made it special was their Dutch restaurant manager who we cannot speak highly enough of.
reviews.title: great

reviews.text: He made this short stop into one of the highlights of our five week tour....
reviews.title: excellent location, clean hotel

reviews.text: We stayed at the holiday inn in Valencia in september 2009. We booked it through hotels.com and payed £210.00 for 4 nights room only,good value Great hotel 25 mins walking from the hotel to the centre 5 mins by bus, bus stop just outside the hotel. We went on a city tour on an open top bus good valueand bus stop opposite the hotel. Nice city lots to see, would reccormend the Oceanagraphic
reviews.title: Bad air

reviews.text: I was very pleased with the service of this hotel. Fine breakfast and a excellent paella restaurant. To go to the beach it is a little bit far more than 45 min walk , but for the city center it is 30 min;ONLY MINUS IS STILL TO PAY FOR THE WIRELESS INTERNET. For a four star hotel this is not so good.
reviews.title: Very good hotel price/kwality

reviews.text: Great Service!! Everyone behind the counter was extremely helpful!
reviews.title: Front desk-So Helpful!

reviews.text: Rooms were really clean and it was enjoyable!
reviews.title: Problem solving zero, otherwise good

likes.disliked: — Disability to clear out a problem

reviews.title: Could be alot better....
reviews.text: Attended a conference there. Conference organizer had checked out (normal) hotel prices, and stated a figure including the breakfast. However, when I and colleagues arrived on saturday, reception stated that breakfast is not included - we showed the conference brochure saying that it is included - reception said they would clear out the thing on Monday. On tuesday I asked about it - it took 10 minutes for another person to find out the papers of that, but it had not been cleared out. On wednesday when leaving third person did not know anything about it - I had to leave for a bus and asked for clarification and to contact me as soon as possible. Nothing has happened a month later. I also made a complaint to the group (or there is no way to do it in the web, just "feedback") a week after our visit, got a message that my feedback would probably be handled in 10 days - after a couple of weeks NO RESPONSE.
Otherwise the stay at the hotel was OK. Room, cleaning and breakfast were good.
reviews.title: Over-priced rubbish

likes.disliked: — Poor aircon, smelt bad, ripoff price.

description: Holiday Inn Valencia is a modern 4* Hotel situated besides the City of Arts and Science. With good access to the city center and the beach.You can enjoy of our high speed wifi, have a nice meal at our restaurant or have a drink in the evening in our terrace.We have a wide variety of rooms including family rooms for a maximum of 4 adults or 2 adults and 2 children.For business travelers, we can offer our executive floor, with more space for working confortable in your room.
